docs.snippet: The third baseman will have a magnetic resonance imaging test on his left shoulder, which he aggravated during Thursday’s game in Pittsburgh....
docs.lead_paragraph: The third baseman will have a magnetic resonance imaging test on his left shoulder, which he aggravated during Thursday’s game in Pittsburgh.
docs.abstract: MLB Roundup; New York Mets third baseman David Wright will undergo magnetic resonance imaging for shoulder aggravation sustained during game against the Pittsburgh Pirates.

headline.main: Shoulder Injury Sends Mets’ Wright Back to New York
headline.print_headline: Mets Handed Defeat in 11th and an Injury Concern Before the Game

docs.snippet: Richard Nixon and Pelé had a quick and awkward meeting in 1973. Nixon had something else on his mind: Watergate....
docs.lead_paragraph: Richard Nixon and Pelé had a quick and awkward meeting in 1973. Nixon had something else on his mind: Watergate.
docs.abstract: The Upshot; Pres Richard Nixon and soccer star Pele, member of the Brazilian team that won the World Cup championship of 1970, met briefly in 1973; interaction was awkward, both because soccer was not yet a popular sport in the United States and because Nixon was attempting to cope with fast-escalating Watergate scandal.

headline.main: Nixon and Pelé: No Meeting of the Minds
headline.print_headline: A Quick and Awkward Meeting Between a President and Pelé

docs.snippet: A retreat at a monastery in Northern California uses the principles of Zen Buddhism, and the solitude of its rural location, to help provide relief to female veterans....
docs.lead_paragraph: A retreat at a monastery in Northern California uses the principles of Zen Buddhism, and the solitude of its rural location, to help provide relief to female veterans.
docs.abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column; Tassajara Zen Buddhist monastery in Northern California offers female military veterans, who suffer from PTSD and other issues, a workshop retreat using principles of Zen Buddhism.

headline.main: For Women Who Saw Combat, a Place to Find Inner Peace
